trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while processing an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: 在處理 XSLT 轉換時發生錯誤所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XsltException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="XsltException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> object containing all the properties of an <see langword="XsltException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 物件包含 <see langword="XsltException" /> 所有的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="StreamingContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XsltException" /> class using the information in the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件中的資訊，初始化 <see langword="XsltException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤條件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> which threw the <see langword="XsltException" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 擲回 <see langword="XsltException" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="XsltException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="XsltException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="StreamingContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Streams all the <see langword="XsltException" /> properties into the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> class for the given <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 將所有 <see langword="XsltException" /> 屬性資料流至指定之 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示樣式表中發生錯誤的行號。

trans-unit.source: The line number indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 表示樣式表中發生錯誤的行號。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性供<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示樣式表中發生錯誤的行位置。

trans-unit.source: The line position indicating where the error occurred in the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 表示樣式表中發生錯誤的行位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性供<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltCompileException>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted error message describing the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得說明目前例外狀況的格式化錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The formatted error message describing the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 說明目前例外狀況的格式化錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location path of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式表的位置路徑。

trans-unit.source: The location path of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 樣式表的位置路徑。
